title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, River Bank]
description: Little remains of the retaining wall that once held back the lapping currents of the river.  Water sloshing over the banks has turned the road into a long narrow mud puddle punctuated by occasional slabs of stone.  Dark, jagged silhouettes of once lofty towers rise above the ruins to the south of the path.

Little remains of the retaining wall that once held back the lapping currents of the river.  Water sloshing over the banks has turned the road into a long narrow mud puddle punctuated by occasional slabs of stone.  Jagged fingers of stone, remnants of once lofty towers, rise above the ruins to the south of the path.
